actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should establish the discount rate for agricultural paper at a rate which is less than the rate established for commercial and industrial paper.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should establish a discount rate for agricultural paper which is less than the rate for commercial and industrial paper.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System should establish the discount rate for agricultural paper at a rate which is less than the rate established for commercial and industrial paper.
